languages.text: For every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attack, that attack also deals +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the same target. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.
languages.original_text: За каждые 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, которые наносит {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g}, цель также получает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g} дополнительно. Прямой урон: урон, который нельзя уменьшить за счет параметров или {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} цели.

traits.locale_text: For every 10 damage dealt by an Assassin's attack, that attack additionally deals 1 direct damage to the same target. Direct damage: Damage that cannot be reduced by the target's characteristics or bonuses.
For every 10 damage dealt by an Assassin's attack, that attack also deals 1 direct damage to the same target. Direct damage: Damage that cannot be reduced by the target's characteristics or bonuses.

Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: За каждые 10 урона, которые наносит ассасин, цель также получает 1 прямой урон дополнительно. Прямой урон: урон, который нельзя уменьшить за счет характеристик или бонусов цели.
За каждые 10 урона, которые наносит ассасин, цель также получает 1 прямой урон дополнительно. Прямой урон: урон, который нельзя уменьшить за счет характеристик или бонусов цели.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的攻击每造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，便会对同一目标额外造成1点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 直击伤害：此伤害无法被目标的属性或{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果减免。
languages.original_text: For every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attack, that attack also deals +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the same target. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的攻击每造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，便会对同一目标额外造成1点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 直击伤害：此伤害无法被目标的属性或{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果减免。

languages.text: Por cada 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflija el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} con un ataque, dicho ataque inflige también 1 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al mismo objetivo. Daño directo: daño que no se puede reducir mediante los parámetros ni las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} del objetivo.
languages.original_text: For every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attack, that attack also deals +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the same target. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Por cada 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflija el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} con un ataque, dicho ataque inflige también 1 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al mismo objetivo. Daño directo: Daño que no puede verse reducido por las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} del objetivo.

languages.text: Pro 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadenspunkte{/g}, die ein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} mit seinem Angriff verursacht, fügt dieser Angriff demselben Ziel +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. Direktschaden: Schaden, der nicht durch die Parameter oder {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} des Ziels reduziert werden kann.
languages.original_text: For every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attack, that attack also deals +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the same target. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pro 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadenspunkte{/g}, die ein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} mit seinem Angriff verursacht, fügt dieser Angriff demselben Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. Direktschaden: Schaden, der nicht durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} des Ziels reduziert werden kann.

languages.text: Pour chaque tranche de 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par une attaque de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g}, l'attaque inflige également 1 point de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} à la même cible. Dégâts directs : dégâts qui ne peuvent être réduits ni par les caractéristiques ni par les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de la cible.
languages.original_text: For every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attack, that attack also deals +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the same target. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pour chaque tranche de 10 points de dégâts infligés par une attaque de l'Assassin, l'attaque inflige également 1 point de dégâts directs à la même cible. Dégâts directs : dégâts qui ne peuvent être réduits par les caractéristiques ou les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de la cible.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の攻撃で10{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}与えられる度、その攻撃は同じターゲットにさらに+1点の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。 直接ダメージ：ターゲットのパラメーターまたは{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}などで軽減されないダメージ。
languages.original_text: For every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attack, that attack also deals +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the same target. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アサシンの攻撃で10ダメージ与えられる度、その攻撃は同じターゲットにさらに1点の直接ダメージを与える。 直接ダメージ：ターゲットの数値または{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}などで軽減されないダメージ。
